<a name="TmlMap"></a>

```go
var TmlMap = template.FuncMap{
    "tn": func(typeName string) string {
        switch typeName {
        case "m8b":
            return "magic 8 ball"
        default:
            return typeName
        }
    },
}
```

Get suggestion type from request.

If invalid writes into a response body After being invalid, further responses are impossible.
